definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The two-humped camel of central Asia was also domesticated long ago.
sentences.chinese: 中亞的雙峯駱駝，很早以前就被馴化。

sentences.english: Therefore, you have to think of the possibility that this was one of the reasons for domesticating dogs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必須考慮這可能是馴化狗只的其中一個原因。

sentences.english: " Gentling " means training it to except accept the human attention need it needed for care and gloomygrooming.
sentences.chinese: “馴化”意味着訓練他們接受人類必要的照顧與護理。

sentences.english: The rate of survival after habituation was over 90%.
sentences.chinese: 組培苗馴化移栽成活率達90%以上。

sentences.english: The methods of domestication and cultivation Lactarius deliciosus were groped preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 初步摸索出馴化栽培松乳菇的方法。

sentences.english: Through high oil domestications, target bacteria were offered for immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 通過高含油量馴化，爲固定化提供目標微生物。

sentences.english: Agaricas brunnelens is the new breed developed in Hebei Bashang region.
sentences.chinese: 香口蘑是河北壩上地區近年來馴化栽培成功的新品種。

sentences.english: How can we begin Glaucon? the domestication of the spirited Glaucon?
sentences.chinese: 我們如何開始，馴化意志型的？

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for cultivating algam Dendrobium nobile in group in water.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種鐵皮石斛組培苗水培馴化的方法。

sentences.english: A wild goose lay a tame egg.
The body temperature of tree shrew was negative correlation to the cold acclimated time.
sentences.chinese: 中緬樹鼩體溫與冷馴化時間呈顯著負相關。

sentences.english: Egyptian, where cats were supposed to have first been domesticated.
sentences.chinese: 它來自埃及語，因爲貓首先在埃及被人馴化。

sentences.english: Ox is one of the earliest domesticated animals by humans.
sentences.chinese: 牛是人類最早馴化的動物之一。

sentences.english: Semi-domesticated donkeys and cows and horses graze in the natural pastures all along the river-worn valley bed.
sentences.chinese: 半馴化驢，牛和馬沿戴河河谷牀的天然牧場放牧。

sentences.english: Through the study on the cultural technique of artificial domestication of Clitocybe conglobata (Vitt.
sentences.chinese: 通過對塊根蘑人工馴化栽培技術的研究。

sentences.english: Methods of domestication and UV mutagenesis were used to prepare tea wine yeast.
sentences.chinese: 採用馴化與紫外線誘變並用的方法研製茶酒酵母。

definition: to keep (an animal)/to look after the needs of (a person or an animal)/(fig.) to keep (a spy, lackey etc) in one's pay
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority
